product_name: Eagle Creek Marian Zip-Around Wallet - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A classic wallet with a smart wrist-carry option, the women's Eagle Creek Marian Zip-Around wallet offers organization for your cash, credit cards, travel documents and receipts. Interior zippered passport, coin and stretch pockets. Zip-around closure and removable wrist straplet. ID slip pocket with clear window. Exterior zip pocket. Closeout.
short_description: A classic wallet with a smart wrist-carry option, the women's Eagle Creek Marian Zip-Around wallet offers organization for your cash, credit cards, travel documents and receipts.
